author: degano
body:
cms-externals/boost@040a06a

As decided in the ORP, we will move CMSSW_7_3_X and CMSSW_7_2_X (in a
separate PR) to boost 1.57.00 to mitigate forward compatibility issues
of boost_serialization.

Include https://github.com/ktf/cmsdist/commit/184d3e560416a5b0a3493d360db4b22ee7763d06 and small fix for boost setup.
title: Move to boost 1.57.00
